title: How do I know the WSDL URL of my Web Service ?
content: In this tutorial we will learn how to find the SOAP Web Service WSDL URL, so that you can quickly test your SOAP Web Service. SOAP Web Service overview Firstly, letâ€™s deploy a sample SOAP Web Service on JBoss EAP or WildFly. If you inspect the server.log file, you will see that the Logger org.jboss.ws.cxf.metadata ...
